author: phuffyking
title: Newcomer Resources en Español
description: Cardano Education, News & Resources for NEWCOMERS is scarce in any language - & esp. Spanish! Need to provide good info for everyday people.
solution: Library of original educational articles and news in Spanish, to include Cardano basics, current events, and insights for newcomers.
experience: Trained Spanish Teacher & Translator; 14+ yrs Software & Cloud Engineering, Blockchain development, business consulting, technical writing.
